tasks.task: Operating a large pig farm. So first task.

managing over 2,000 pigs across multiple breeds. That's a subtask. They have to breed these pigs, which probably involves feeding, checking for pregnancies, etc. Hmm, but the main thing mentioned in the transcript is that they have a pig farm, so the primary task is operating it. So the answer should start with MAINTASK: Operating a large-scale pig farm.

Producing livestock feed. The subtasks there would be operating the feed mixer, grinding equipment, and storing the feed. Also, they say they buy raw materials like maize, wheat, rice bran, soybean, etc. So they must be involved in purchasing those as well. Maybe store that somehow. All part of the feed production.

Another MAINTASK would be Sanitizing the pens. They always mention sanitizing when they enter a pen. Like, "We have to sanitize. So these are our piglets." So there must be a sanitizing routine. Subtasks could include using disinfectants, changing bedding, etc.

Providing start-up support to other farmers is mentioned. The CEO says, "We don't look at the monetary aspect of it. We look at how we can help you to start up your business." So part of their task is offering training and support to new farmers. So a MAINTASK could be Providing training and support to other farmers.

Another MAINTASK would be Marketing the farm. They use social media to share videos, interact with potential customers and farmers. The video mentions, "If you enjoyed this video, do all to like, share, subscribe." So they do marketing through social media and maybe other channels. Also, collaborating with other businesses.
